channel.title: How does this sound?
channel.description:
A fine, BASIC, simple server source sound? Right now I am making a RyScape source(cleaned delta by tatemo was my source), but I am not putting customs. Honestly who wants a pink whip? Or a Different colored platebody? Right now I've got this down (only worked on it for a day or two) -Added skillcapes -Added hoods -Added some commands What I will do in the next week: -Soon be adding all godswords and armor like bandos...(should be done with that by tommorrow) -Changing home to lumbridge; where I think it should be. -Adding shops and training spots ... Basically I'm making a simple server source without all the gay NPC's, objects, and customs that take forever to completely edit out. My question is would you download it as a source?
Also if anyone would like to help, I would appriciate it because I don't have a lot of free time(thats why it will take a week to add shops, training areas, and some weps!). Just message me if interested.

item.title: How does this sound?
item.dc:creator: @Berky-Scape Berky-Scape
item.description:
@Berky-Scape wrote:

[quote=“JosephLazarus, post:4, topic:329635”][quote author=Berky-Scape link=topic=426015.msg3129653#msg3129653 date=1266347389]
can’t hear it
[/quote]

Why not?[/quote]
It doesn’t make any sound.

Read full topic

item.title: How does this sound?
item.dc:creator: @RyScape RyScape
item.description:
@RyScape wrote:

A fine, BASIC, simple server source sound? Right now I am making a RyScape source(cleaned delta by tatemo was my source), but I am not putting customs. Honestly who wants a pink whip? Or a Different colored platebody? Right now I’ve got this down (only worked on it for a day or two)
-Added skillcapes
-Added hoods
-Added some commands
What I will do in the next week:
-Soon be adding all godswords and armor like bandos…(should be done with that by tommorrow)
-Changing home to lumbridge; where I think it should be.
-Adding shops and training spots
…
Basically I’m making a simple server source without all the gay NPC’s, objects, and customs that take forever to completely edit out.
My question is would you download it as a source?

Also if anyone would like to help, I would appriciate it because I don’t have a lot of free time(thats why it will take a week to add shops, training areas, and some weps!). Just message me if interested.
